downloadTitle: Database Migration between Azure SQL (DB/MI) and SQL Server using SmartBulkCOpy
downloadDescription: Migrate databases between the various Azure SQL offerings as well as reverse migrate the databases back to on-premises SQL Servers running in the customers environments.
detailsSection: Database Migration / Reverse Migration between Azure SQL (DB/MI) and SQL Server using SmartBulkCopy. Migrate databases between the various Azure SQL offerings as well as reverse migrate the databases back to on-premises SQL Servers running in the customers environments.
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a zipped folder that contains Database Compare Utility Tool and associated documentation.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do the following:
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
